hadiths.text: While relating the tradition about Barirah A’ishah said “her husband was a slave, so the Prophet(ﷺ) gave her choice. She chose herself. Had he been a free man, he would not given her choice.”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْمَمْلُوكَةِ تَعْتِقُ وَهِيَ تَحْتَ حُرٍّ أَوْ عَبْدٍ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding A Slave Woman Who Was Married To Slave A Or Free Man And Then Freed
